info.title: Amelia REST API
info.description: The Amelia REST API allows for client applications to connect to Amelia and hold conversations using simple REST commands and webhookUrls or polling.

get.description: Obtains the list of 1RPA Instances for display, optionally filtered by name

parameters.name: search
parameters.description: Name to search for in the 1RPA instance

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: The zero-indexed page of results to return

parameters.name: size
parameters.description: The size of each results page

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: A list of {field},{dir} sort directives, where dir can be asc or desc

parameters.name: X-Amelia-Rest-Token
parameters.description: The temporary access token provided upon initial login

400.description: A status and message error, with optional other fields

410.description: A status and message error, typically when the session or conversation does not exist

get.description: Gets the list of audited events

parameters.name: search
parameters.description: Text search, of event name or domain code when the event was audited

parameters.name: from
parameters.description: the start of the search window, in format M/d/y H:m

parameters.name: to
parameters.description: the end of the search window, in format M/d/y H:m

parameters.name: tz
parameters.description: the code of the time zone if a time zone offset if required; if omitted, will use from/to as UTC

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: The zero-indexed page of results to return

parameters.name: size
parameters.description: The size of each results page

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: A list of {field},{dir} sort directives, where dir can be asc or desc

parameters.name: X-Amelia-Rest-Token
parameters.description: The temporary access token provided upon initial login

200.description: Successful list of audit events list

400.description: A status and message error, with optional other fields

410.description: A status and message error, typically that the session does not exist

queueCode.description: The code of the queue in Amelia, or __total for a summary of all in this request

queueName.description: The code of the queue in Amelia, or Total for a summary of all in this request

slaCritical.description: The number of escalations exceeding their sla critical threshold

slaOk.description: The number of escalations within their sla time

slaWarn.description: The number of escalations exceeding their sla warning threshold, but not their critical threshold

addDefaultVirtualHost.description: if true, the default virtual host will be added to the virtualHostIds list, regardless of what is submitted.  Defaults to true

id.description: The primary key of the Authentication System

name.description: The name of the Authentication System

code.description: The code of the Authentication System

description.description: A description of the Authentication System

type.description: The type of the Authentication System, which in turn determines the properties needed

disabled.description: true if this Authentication System is disabled, false if is is active

immediate.description: true if this Authentication System enables an immediate action, such as a redirect, without any user intervention, false otherwise

virtualHostIds.description: a set of primary keys of virtualHosts in which this authentication system will participate

displayOnLoginWindow.description: true if the Amelia configuration prefers it displayed in login widgets, false otherwise

loginWindowOrder.description: If displaying in a login widget with other Authentication Systems, the 0-based ordering

adDomain.description: AD Type: The active directory domain to use

customProperties.description: Custom Type: A list of properties the Authentication System uses

customProviderClass.description: Custom Type: The fully qualified class name of the implementation of this Authentication System

ldapUserDnPatterns.description: LDAP Type: userDn patterns in the Directory

ldapUserSearchBase.description: LDAP Type: search base in the Directory

ldapUserSearchFilter.description: LDAP Type: search filter in the Directory

ldapUserFirstNameAttribute.description: LDAP Type: the LDAP attribute that should correspond to Amelia first name

ldapUserLastNameAttribute.description: LDAP Type: the LDAP attribute that should correspond to Amelia last name

ldapContextManagerDn.description: LDAP Type: identity of the user querying the LDAP server

ldapContextManagerPassword.description: LDAP Type: password of the user querying the LDAP server

ldapAutoCreate.description: LDAP Type: true to auto-create users in Amelia, false otherwise, which will require manual creation before that user may log in

ldapDefaultUserGroups.description: LDAP Type: comma separated list of Amelia groups to which to add created users

ldapDefaultUserGroupScript.description: LDAP Type: a groovy script calculating Amelia groups in which to put user, will suppress ldapDefaultUserGroups if it returns any

ldapGroupSync.description: LDAP Type: a comma separated list of groups to sync the user's membership; ignored if we have a ldapDefaultUserGroupScript

ldapPrimaryDomainCode.description: LDAP Type: the code of a the domain with which to associate users

ldapPrimaryDomainScript.description: LDAP Type: a script calculating the code of a the domain with which to associate users If present and successful in finding a domain, ldapPrimaryDomainCode will be ignored

ldapAlwaysChangeDomain.description: LDAP Type: true to change the domain if necessary on each login, false to set domain on creation only

samlSpNoAlias.description: SAML2 Type: true to alias the entry point by code, false otherwise

samlSignMetadata.description: SAML2 Type: true if the metadata will be signed by a certificate, false otherwise

samlMetadataTrustCheck.description: SAML2 Type: true to force a check of metadata, false otherwise

samlMetadataRequireSignature.description: SAML2 Type: true if metadata requires a signature, false otherwise

samlMetadataProviderType.description: SAML2 Type: the type of metadata for this provider

samlUserGroup.description: SAML2 Type: name of a user group to which to assign users

samlUserGroupScript.description: SAML2 Type: a script by which to calculate a group to assign users; if present and successful,  samlUserGroup is ignored

samlAlwaysChangeDomain.description: SAML2 Type: true to change the domain of the user if needed on each login, false to change the domain only on creation

samlDefaultDomainScript.description: SAML2 Type: a script by which to calculate a domain to assign users; if none found, domain will  be taken from first non-global group of the user

samlIdpMetadataUrl.description: SAML2 Type: if http metadata, the url

samlIdpMetadataXml.description: SAML2 Type: if file metadata, the metadata xml

samlIdpSslCertificate.description: SAML2 Type: the SSL certificate of the provider

samlSpBaseUrl.description: SAML2 Type: the base url of the metadata to generate

samlSpEntityId.description: SAML2 Type: the entity id of the metadata to generate

samlSpSslCertificate.description: SAML2 Type: ssl certificate to add to the metadata upon generation

samlSpSslPrivateKey.description: SAML2 Type: private key to add to the metadata upon generation

samlSpSslKeyPassword.description: SAML2 Type: private key password to add to the metadata upon generation

samlEmailProperty.description: SAML2 Type: the SAML user property corresponding to Amelia email

samlLastNameProperty.description: SAML2 Type: the SAML user property corresponding to Amelia last name

samlFirstNameProperty.description: SAML2 Type: the SAML user property corresponding to Amelia first name

samlExternalUidProperty.description: SAML2 Type: the SAML user property corresponding to Amelia externalUid property

samlUseExternalId.description: SAML2 Type: true to look up the user by externalId when loading the user from SAML, false to use email.

samlAutoCreate.description: SAML2 Type: true to auto-create users when needed, false to require manual creation

samlLoginRedirects.description: SAML2 Type: JSON defining redirect URLs according to the login code and mode

wsFederationStsFriendlyName.description: WS_FEDERATION Type: A descriptive name of the STS provider

wsFederationThumbprint.description: WS_FEDERATION Type: Thumbprint for the STS certificate

wsFederationRealm.description: WS_FEDERATION Type: Realm of the STS provider

wsFederationTrustedIssuers.description: WS_FEDERATION Type: Trusted issues of STS credentials

code.description: The unique code of the domain

enabled.description: If the domain is currently active for use

agentTranslationEnabled.description: Whether or not this conversations will attempt to auto-translate agent messages not in the domain's native language

aiOpsClientCode.description: AI Ops client code associated with this domain

allowAnonymousUsers.description: Whether or not this domain allows anonymous users to participate in conversations

allowAnonymousView.description: Whether this domain is visible to anonymous users.  May still require them to be authenticatedto have an actual conversation

allowConversations.description: Whether or not this domain supports conversations

allowNpsCollection.description: Allow Amelia to take feedback from user when a bpn context ends, defaults to true

allowSwitchIn.description: If true, this domain will allow user to switch to domain during conversation context switching

allowSwitchOut.description: If true, this domain will allow user to switch out of domain during conversation context switching

ameliaUserId.description: The unique identifier of the user of this domain, if any

anonymousUserGroupId.description: Anonymous users will receive the authorities on this domain from this group if specified

authenticationPolicyId.description: The UUID of the authenticationPolicy that governs this domain

avatarId.description: The primary key of an avatar of the same type as specified in avatarType

avatarType.description: A valid avatar setting for this domain.

avatarVoice.description: The default voice used when the avatar speaks in this domain

conversationSummaryCleanupDaysRetained.description: The number of days of data to retain in the database after the cleanup summary job completes

customTranslationSettings.description: Optional custom translation settings for this domain

defaultEscalationQueueId.description: The UUID of an escalation queue to handle conversation escalations in this domain

domainBeanMappings.description: A list of mappings, from one bean to another.  Each key needs to be unique

domainTemplateCode.description: Template assigned while creating a Domain

greetingBpnId.description: If configured, the BPN to automatically run at the start of a conversation in this domain

greetingGoalId.description: If configured, the intent to automatically run at the start of a conversation in this domain

id.description: The unique id of the domain

integrationApiKey.description: An api key any integration host must possess to run integrations for this domain.  If empty, domain will inherit from its parent

languageDetectionFilters.description: The set of languageDetection filters for this domain

localeTag.description: The language and locale of the domain

maintainDetectedLanguage.description: Whether when translation is detected if the detected language should persist for future messages in the conversation

oneRpaInstanceId.description: UUID of the OneRpa Instance connected to this domain

oneStoreInstanceId.description: UUID of the 1Store instance connected to this domain

orchestratorConfigId.description: Orchestrator configuration Id associated to Domain

orchestratorUserId.description: User Id used for all operation in Amelia Orchestrator

parentCode.description: The code if this domain's parent, if any

parentId.description: The unique identifier of the parent domain, if any

preCloseBpnId.description: If configured, the BPN to run right before a conversation is closed

preCloseSurveyBpnId.description: If configured, a survey BPN to run right before a conversation is closed, before pre-close BPN
